subject: Football
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Sydney Seau paid tribute to her father, Junior, in an onstage interview after the showing of a video, but the Hall of Fame did not address the circumstances of his death.
